ch.unige.ng.tools.io
Class FilePrinter

java.lang.Object
  java.io.OutputStream
      ch.unige.ng.tools.io.FilePrinter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable
public class FilePrinter
extends java.io.OutputStream
implements Flushable

n-genes

This class defines a file printer. It is a class that writes in a class, it can check if the object allready exists, it can overwrite or not the file. It is possible to compress the created files.

Version:
16 febr. 2005
Author:
Jacques Fontignie
